message: Well, I have lived in Vancouver almost my whole life and love it here.. except for the weather. I have been doing web development for the past few years but I'm now transitioning into real estate. I've always loved technology, so its something I love to discuss and imagine about. Anyone else want to share something about themselves?

I'm a student at BCIT in Burnaby. So I'm Burnaby technically, but its close enough. :P I'm doing a chemistry program, and I've been here since the fall of 2010. I'm originally from a gulf island off of Vancouver Island. Oh, and photography is a hobby of mine.
